name: humdrum-ui
description: A simple sass based ui library.

scripts.watch:sass: npm run build:sass && npm run build:sass -- -w -r
scripts.watch:docs: npm run build:docs && watch -p './dist/**/*.*' -p './template/**/*.*' -c 'npm run build:docs'
scripts.watch: npm run watch:sass & npm run watch:docs & npm run browsersync
scripts.build: npm run build:sass && npm run build:docs
